title: Giro Stage 13: Pedersen Outmuscles Van Aert in Brutal Finale, Del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink
content:
Pink jersey Del Toro expands gap over teammate Ayuso with intermediate bonuses and a split at the finish line. Who can stop the Mercxian Mexican?

Read the full article at Giro Stage 13: Pedersen Outmuscles Van Aert in Brutal Finale, Del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
